Function for handling tests

handleTests.Rd

Function for handling tests

Usage

handleTests(
  data,
  targetCohortId,
  presenceFilter,
  runZTests = TRUE,
  runLogitTests = TRUE,
  runKSTests = TRUE,
  numCores = parallel::detectCores() - 1
)

Arguments

data

Data list object

targetCohortId

Target cohort id

presenceFilter

numeric > if set, removes all features represented less than the given percentage

runZTests

boolean for Z-tests

runLogitTests

boolean for logit-tests

runKSTests

boolean for KS-tests
